wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-General Robert Clark Menzies CB OBE (born 1944) is a retired British Army medical officer and Surgeon General of the British Armed Forces between 2000 and 2002.

response: *Lt-Gen Robert Menzies CB OBE, Surgeon General to the Armed Forces from 2000 to 2002
| Lieutenant General || Robert Menzies ||  || 2000–2002Lieutenant General RC Menzies (b. 1944) Kilmarnock Academy
Robert Menzies was the longest-serving prime minister of Australia.
Robert Menzies may also refer to:
* Robert Menzies (cricketer) (1916–1983), Australian-born New Zealand cricketer
* Robert Menzies (water polo) (born 1946), Australian Olympic water polo player
* Robert Menzies College, a residential college of Macquarie University
*Robert Menzies (British Army officer) (born 1944), British Army lieutenant general
